pages.title: Ender Dropper
pages.text: The Ender Dropper is the counterpart to the Ender Hopper. With every redstone push it ejects an item from your Ender Chest.$(br2)The Ender Dropper only works as long as you are online. But beware: Who is stopping you from placing a button next to it and emptying your Ender Chest?
